pattern.name: Number of child types
pattern.description:
Number of distinct values of the child nominal field with the child filter F.
This is a very fast pattern with modest predictive power.
pattern.example: Average distinct number of cache sets accessed during a given time unit.
pattern.author: Filip Trojan
pattern.code: SELECT @base , count(distinct @nominalColumn) AS @columnName FROM @propagatedTable GROUP BY @base
